features: VOICE CLARITY COMES NATURALLY - This USB gaming microphone comes equipped with a one-key noise cancellation function (Long press for 3 seconds to turn on/off noise cancellation), which allows it to effectively suppress background noises. Additionally, the USB microphone's cardioid polar pattern is designed to focus on sound coming directly in front of the mic. It's guaranteed to make your voice come through loud and clear in game streaming, chatting, and podcasting.

STUNNING RGB LIGHTING - This PC gaming microphone boasts stunning RGB lighting, with dynamic multicolor, breathing light, or static solid color modes. This helps to create an immersive gaming experience and adds an extra layer of visual appeal to your gaming setup. The RGB lighting can choose to suit your preferences, helping you to set the tone for gameplay and create an exciting atmosphere. It enhances your gaming performance, whether you're playing solo or competing with others online.

ONE-CLICK MUTE WITH LED INDICATOR - This USB computer microphone is equipped with a one-click mute function, which ensures that you have easy control over your gaming audio. Whether you need to take a quick break or engage in a private conversation, this feature allows you to instantly mute the PC mic with just one click. The red LED light indicates that the mute function is active, and the green light tells you that it's off.

MIC GAIN CONTROL AND MONITORING - The gain control on this game streaming microphone allows you to customize the microphone's sensitivity so it can pick up sounds from various distances and volumes. By adjusting the mic gain, you can increase or decrease the USB microphone's sensitivity to suit your needs and the surrounding environment, ensuring that you capture clear and precise audio. To have real-time monitoring of your sound, plug headphones into the PC mic’s jack.

PLUG AND PLAY - Simply hook up the gaming condenser microphone to your PC, computer, laptop, desktop, Mac, and Android phone with the included USB-C to USB/USB-C 2 in 1 cable. Start gaming, streaming, podcasting, or online chatting in no time. (Note: Not compatible with XBOX)

ALL-IN-ONE KIT - Includes USB gaming microphone x1, sturdy stand x1, pop filter x1, shock mount x1, USB-C to USB-A/USB-C cable x1, user manual x1, boom arm adapter x1. This PC mic can fit 5/8" to 3/8" threaded mic stand setups.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Versatile USB Condenser Microphone MAONO Gaming Microphone for PC The USB microphone is specifically designed for gamers, One-key noise-cancellation technology eliminates unwanted background sounds, enabling you to communicate clearly and efficiently with your fellow gamers. The RGB lighting function provides a visually appealing experience that can help you fully immerse yourself in your gameplay, which one-click mute, microphone gain control, and real-time monitoring feature will enhancements to your overall gaming experience. Long Press for 3s to Turn on Noise Cancellation MAONO Noise Cancellation Microphone The noise-canceling microphone is designed to eliminate background noise and provide clear and crisp audio. This allows gamers to communicate more effectively with their teammates and focus on their gameplay without any unwanted distractions. The optimal recording distance is 6-12 inches (1-4 fist-lengths).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After lots of research on affordable microphone products, I ordered this one it is easy to use with plug-and-play options, noise noise-canceling, mute buttons, and led multi-color light options. It is very sturdy and the mic is adjustable. If you are looking for a decent mic with many affordable options, this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works As Expected! 👍🏻
reviews.reviewText: This REALLY inexpensive desktop mic ($34.95!) has the features THIS "Oldster" needs and appreciates. The clarity is about as good as it gets, with the mid-tones not being as mushy or tinny as quite a few mics under $50 sometimes sound, IMHO. And I like that it comes in its desktop stand, but also a separate piece for attaching to a boom_ VERY nice touch! :-) Oh, and the mic is suspended with a 4-point shock-cord system!If ya enjoy light shows, this thing has all the primary colors to choose plus some extra, some solid in color while others having a graduation from top-to-bottom two-color effect. You can choose from solid to a sort of pulsing, have it going from color-to-color, OR simply turn it off, and it is VERY simple with the touch of the button!The 'pattern' is very noticeable. When recording wile slowly turning the mic to talk at all the angles, there is a VERY noticeable drop when turning to the back of the mic. The side rejection, while not as significant as the back, is still very good!This is not a mic well suited for table use regarding several people having a meeting around the table. This mic is primarily used for being about 6-to-12 inches from the face. I would think the PERFECT use would be to have each person with this mic in from of their mouths, mounted on a boom arm... VERY directional.The noise-cancelling is really good. I had a loud radio program talk show, easily picked up by the mic, about 14 feet away, with the speaker at about a 45° angle to my front-left. While the radio's audio was not 100% reduced when noise-cancelling enabled, it was VERY much reduced.The ONLY 'con' I have is the large gain control knob at the bottom. It is extremely easy to turn, so you can accidentally nudge it while say moving it around the desk. When I get a chance, I might just put a piece of tape over the knob at the max setting to keep that from happing... I'm lazy, and have no use for the gain being less than max on the mic. And the pop-screen is a nice touch.If you are looking to get a very affordable desk-top microphone with a great sound result, for use directly in front of the face, I really can't think why THIS one shouldn't suit the need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Overall good sound production with this microphone within this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Maono DGM20 review
reviews.reviewText: The microphone was smaller than I thought, but the LED was beautiful enough. It has USB and C-type cable and I am glad the filter was pretty clear. The sound was not bad, it was not really good but not really bad just useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars surprisingly good for a 30$ mic
reviews.reviewText: i'm not an audio specialist but comparing this to my samson q2u for the purpose of gaming, zoom, discord, everyday communications use, I hear very little difference between that and this mic. the samson q2u actually picks up plosives like p's and s's more intrusively. there's a definite difference in character because the samson is a dynamic microphone but unless your singing into the mic or recording music I think this is the nicest mic that someone would make use of. my girlfriend tried using it on a desk sitting in a chair and it was a little too far away for great sound, so you would be best served if you had some way to mount it within 6-8 inches from your face. I use a cymbal stand from my drumset with a 3d printed adapter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got compliments on my mic. Just be aware this is for PC and other consoles only I believe. It is not compatible with Xbox. Good for those who have PC or want to start a podcast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Its an mediocer mic, defintally worth the 40 dollars in my opinion. The audio quality is okay, not as bad as a headset mic, not as clear as an 5 star mic. You can change the sensitivity physically and thats really helpfull. Barley picks up background noise, beautiful colors. the only issue is the shortness, def get a arm with this cause its a very small mic. the quaility that its made of isnt the best either, very easy to break plastic so dont get this for a child or if you have handsy kids. very easy to setup just plug it in and go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was an awesome product I got it for my son for Christmas. He loves it and it works perfect
Im a new youtuber my channel name is INKED GAMER and I'm using this mic it's great product I'm glad i picked up the right product.
